string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: Added display option in Settings to address Max Power Saving resolution
Made more modes available for N4 Camera. Seperate files
White Gallery should now be completely fixed for users that still have issues
Busybox rework and updated
Added fix for Gallery Auto Adjust
Added charging fix for all kernel. Thanks to Ghost
Updated N4 Camera filters
Signature verification removal reworked
Uneeded libs cleaned out
Night clock fixed from blinking
Fix some lags when opening settings app
Added 10 custom GPS config file in rom control. User can try which works best for them.
MAX Power Saving Mode fixed. No need for rom control fix
Fixed SystemUI FC when applying Power Saving mode
New Wifi Password Manager
Increase Wifi connection keep alive
Increase Mobile Signal connection keep alive
Improve power management
Complete Gallery auto enhance fix
No need for screen density slider, Power should modes works out of the box
Improvements to s7e and N7 camera
Touchwiz updated with more functionality. Now long press to launch action
Added Matrix effect in recent panel
Added Launcher option for infinite scrolling in rom control and aroma
And many more. Please see our thread for full changelog
